content.description: Stem and Shout has really nice movement!Start on the right side of the face, and climb the path of least resistance into the corner. From the corner, make some delicate, balancing moves (stem & mantle) across the face to the ramp on to your left (crux). From the ramp, ascend straight up to the top.
content.protection: There are trees + large cracks at the top for a toprope anchor, but it can probably be bouldered with a good spotter.
content.location: This is on the south face of the Bear's Den "crag".Â

content.description: Sit start, crank, and traverse left using the good feet to the overhanging arete. Fire straight up the overhang, and top out.
content.location: This should be the first piece of rock you encounter when approaching the Bear's Den area from the Jerry Jingle Road. When facing the Bear's Den "crag", this is about 30 feet to the climber's right.

pathTokens: BooJum Rock Area at Middlesex Fells

content.description: Bears Den is a small cliff with two climbable faces. The southwest face has a cavity that sort of looks like a cave.
